[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/move_vm_ext/vm.rs] [Resource] [CPU exhaustion] Can genesis code execute infinite loops or exponential-complexity algorithms without gas limits, hanging validators? (High)
[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/move_vm_ext/vm.rs] [Resource] [Storage exhaustion] Can genesis write operations fill the entire storage backend before genesis completes? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/move_vm_ext/vm.rs] [Crypto] [Genesis ID predictability] Is the genesis_id parameter in new_genesis_session() required to be unpredictable, or can a predictable genesis_id enable attacks? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/move_vm_ext/vm.rs] [Crypto] [Chain ID entropy] Does ChainId have sufficient entropy to prevent chain ID collision attacks across different Aptos deployments? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/move_vm_ext/vm.rs] [Determinism] [Environment cloning determinism] Is AptosEnvironment::clone() deterministic across validators, or can environmental differences cause non-deterministic clones? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/move_vm_ext/vm.rs] [Determinism] [Feature flag ordering] Does Features::default() return features in a deterministic order across validators and platforms? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/move_vm_ext/vm.rs] [Determinism] [Native function ordering] Are natives from aptos_natives_with_builder registered in deterministic order across validators? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/move_vm_ext/vm.rs] [Determinism] [VM config determinism] Does aptos_prod_vm_config produce identical VMConfig across validators with different hardware/OS? (Critical)
[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/move_vm_ext/vm.rs] [Determinism] [Timestamp in genesis] Can TimedFeaturesBuilder::enable_all() introduce non-determinism through timestamp checks? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/move_vm_ext/vm.rs] [Access Control] [Genesis privilege retention] Can code executed during genesis retain elevated privileges after genesis completion? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/move_vm_ext/vm.rs] [Access Control] [VM instance reuse] Can a GenesisRuntimeBuilder or GenesisMoveVm be reused for non-genesis operations, retaining genesis privileges? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/move_vm_ext/vm.rs] [Access Control] [Session creation authorization] Is there access control on who can call new_session() or new_genesis_session(), or can anyone create VM sessions? (High)
[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/move_vm_ext/vm.rs] [Access Control] [Resolver authorization] Is there validation that only authorized code can provide resolvers to VM sessions? (High)
[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/move_vm_ext/vm.rs] [Access Control] [Feature flag modification] Can untrusted code modify Features after VM initialization to bypass security checks? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/move_vm_ext/vm.rs] [Privilege Escalation] [Genesis to production escalation] Can a session created with new_genesis_session() be used to execute regular transactions with genesis privileges? (Critical)
